label.description: An author-localized label for each toast. Used to help screen reader users associate the interruption with a toast.
label.description_zh: 每个吐司的作者本地化标签.用于帮助屏幕阅读器用户将中断与吐司关联起来.

duration.description: Time in milliseconds that each toast should remain visible for.
duration.description_zh: 每个吐司应保持可见的时间()以毫秒为单位).

swipeDirection.description: Direction of pointer swipe that should close the toast.
swipeDirection.description_zh: 应关闭吐司的指针滑动方向.

swipeThreshold.description: Distance in pixels that the swipe must pass before a close is triggered.
swipeThreshold.description_zh: 滑动必须经过的距离()以像素为单位),然后才会触发关闭.
